targets.expr: max by (job, namespace, controller, controller_name) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]))

sum by (controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]) * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left() sum by (controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", update_policy="Off"}[$__range]))) * 0
or
sum by (controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]) * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left() sum by (controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", update_policy="Initial"}[$__range]))) * 0 + 1
or
sum by (controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]) * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left() sum by (controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", update_policy="Auto"}[$__range]))) * 0 + 2
or
sum by (controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]) * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left() sum by (controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", update_policy="Recreate"}[$__range]))) * 0 + 3
or
sum by (controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) * 0 + 5

sum by (controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]) * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__range])))
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])
    * on (pod) group_left()
    sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
  )
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])
    * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left()
    sum by(controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_recommendation{container!="POD",namespace="$namespace", recommendation_type="target", resource_type="cpu"}[$__range]))
  ) 
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])
    * on (namespace, pod) group_left()
    sum by (namespace, pod)
      (
        (
          sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
          -
          sum by(namespace, pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
        ) > 0
      )
  )
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])
    * on (namespace, pod) group_left()
    sum by (namespace, pod)
      (
        (
          (
            sum by(namespace, pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
            -
            sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
          ) or sum by(namespace, pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
        ) > 0
      )
  )
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]) * on (pod) group_left() ((sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])) / sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))) * sum by (pod) (rate(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))))
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]) * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__range])))
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])
    * on (pod) group_left()
    sum by (namespace, pod)
      (
        avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__range])
      )
    )
  or
  count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])
    * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left()
    sum by(controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_recommendation{container!="POD",namespace="$namespace", recommendation_type="target", resource_type="memory"}[$__range]))
  ) 
  or  
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])
    * on (namespace, pod) group_left()
    sum by (namespace, pod)
      (
        (
          sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
          -
          sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
        ) > 0
      )
  )
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller)
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])
    * on (namespace, pod) group_left()
    sum by (namespace, pod)
      (
        (
          (
            sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
            -
            sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
          ) or sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
        ) > 0
      )
  )
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller) (
  kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"} 
  * on (pod) group_left() 
  (
    sum by (pod) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
    -
    (
      sum by (pod) (
        sum by (namespace, pod) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))
        *  
        sum by (namespace, pod) (kube_pod_spec_host_network{namespace=~"$namespace"})
      )
    )
  )
)
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller) (
  kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"} 
  * on (pod) group_left() 
  (
    sum by (pod) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
    -
    (
      sum by (pod) (
        sum by (namespace, pod) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range]))
        *  
        sum by (namespace, pod) (kube_pod_spec_host_network{namespace=~"$namespace"})
      )
    )
  )
)
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]) * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])))
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]) * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_fs_writes_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])))
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

max by (controller) (max by (namespace, controller_type, controller_name, controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) * on (namespace, controller_type, controller_name) group_left() max by (namespace, controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_replicas{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])))
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

((max by (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name, controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range]))) *  on (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name) group_right(controller)
(avg_over_time(kube_controller_replicas[$__range]) - avg_over_time(kube_controller_replicas_ready[$__range])))
or
max by (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name, controller) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) * 0

sum by (controller) 
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])
    * on (pod) group_left()
    sum by (pod) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]))
  )
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

sum by (controller) 
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])
    * on (pod) group_left()
    sum by (pod) (label_replace(increase(klog_pod_oomkill{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]), "pod", "$1", "pod_name", "(.+)"))
  )
or
count (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"}[$__range])) by (controller) * 0

((max by (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name, controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"})) *  on (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name) group_right(controller) 
(kube_controller_replicas_ready/kube_controller_replicas == 1)) * 1

((max by (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name, controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"})) *  on (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name) group_right(controller) 
((kube_controller_replicas_ready/kube_controller_replicas >   0) and  (kube_controller_replicas_ready/kube_controller_replicas <  0.3)) > bool 0)  * 2

((max by (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name, controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"})) *  on (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name) group_right(controller) 
((kube_controller_replicas_ready/kube_controller_replicas >=   0.3) and  (kube_controller_replicas_ready/kube_controller_replicas <  0.6)) > bool 0)  * 3

((max by (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name, controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"})) *  on (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name) group_right(controller) 
((kube_controller_replicas_ready/kube_controller_replicas >=   0.6) and  (kube_controller_replicas_ready/kube_controller_replicas <  1)) > bool 0)  * 4

((max by (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name, controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"})) *  on (job, namespace, controller_type, controller_name) group_right(controller)
(kube_controller_replicas_ready/kube_controller_replicas == 0)) * 5

targets.expr: sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__interval_sx4])))

sum (sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__interval_sx4]))))

panels.description: Total может быть не равен system + user из-за особенностей учета cgroup в ядре. Более детально можно почитать тут: https://www.kernel.org/doc/Documentation/cgroup-v1/cpuacct.txt

targets.expr: sum (sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_system_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__interval_sx4]))))

sum (sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__interval_sx4]))))

sum (sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", container!="POD"}[$__interval_sx4]))))

panels.title: Usage by state

panels.description: На данном графике отображаются запрошенные (requested) ресурсы CPU выше реального потребления CPU. По факту, сколько CPU следует "освободить", сохранив при этом корректную работу сервиса.
panels.title: Over-requested by controller

panels.description: На данном графике отображаются запрошенные (requested) ресурсы CPU ниже реального потребления CPU. По факту, сколько ещё CPU нужно "застолбить", для корректной работы сервиса.
panels.title: Under-requested by controller

panels.description: Если на графике нет данных, значит не заданы ресурсы для контейнеров

panels.title: $controller

panels.description: Метрика Working set bytes - реально используемая память контейнером, так как включает active file memory. И пр достижении данного значения к лимиту, может прийти OOMKiller. Данное значение может быть выше RSS + Cache. Так как не вся active file memory является Cache.
panels.title: Usage by state

panels.description: На данном графике отображаются запрошенные (requested) ресурсы Memory выше реального потребления Memory. По факту, сколько Memory следует "освободить", сохранив при этом корректную работу сервиса.
panels.title: Over-requested by controller

panels.description: На данном графике отображается запрошенные (requested) ресурсы Memory выше реального потребления Memory. По факту, сколько еще Memory необходимо "застолбить" для корректной работы сервиса.

panels.description: На данном графике отображены Network Recieve, за исключением подов в hostNetwork.
panels.title: Recieve

panels.description: На данном графике отображены Network Transmit, за исключением подов в hostNetwork.
panels.title: Transmit

targets.expr: sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_sx4])))

sum (sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_sx4]))))

sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_fs_writes_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_sx4])))

sum (sum by (controller) (kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller_type=~"$controller_type", controller=~"$controller"} * on (pod) group_left() sum by (pod) (rate(container_fs_writes_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_sx4]))))

panels.description: На данном графике не отображается информация о НЕ localstorage-дисках, так как в localstorage-дисках потребленное место рассчитывается неверно.

targets.expr:
sum (
  sum by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
    max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes{namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_sx3])
  ) 
  * 
  sum by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
    label_replace(
      max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_sx3]),
      "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
    + on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0)

  )
  unless
  sum by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
    max_over_time(kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_sx3])
  ) 
) 
and (count (kube_node_info) == count (kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}))

sum (
  sum by (namespace, controller) (
    max by (namespace, controller, persistentvolumeclaim)
    (
      sum by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
          max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_sx3])
      ) 

      * max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
        label_replace(
          max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_sx3]),
          "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
          + on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0)

      )

      * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_left(pod) 
      max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim, pod) (
         max_over_time(kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_sx3])
      ) 

      * on (namespace, pod) group_left(controller)
      kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} 
    )
  )
)
+
(sum (
  sum by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
    max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes{namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_sx3])
  ) 
  * 
  sum by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
    label_replace(
      max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_sx3]),
      "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
    + on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0)

  )
  unless
  sum by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
    max_over_time(kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_sx3])
  ) 
) * (count (kube_node_info) == bool count (kube_node_info{node=~"$node"})))

panels.title: PVC Provisioned (except local storage classes)

panels.description:
На данном графике не отображается информация о НЕ localstorage-дисках, так как в localstorage-дисках потребленное место рассчитывается неверно. 

Так как в rook нет поддержки метрик, то на данных графиках не отображается информация о дисках созданных rook'ом: https://github.com/deckhouse/deckhouse/issues/443
panels.title: PVC Usage (except local storage classes)

panels.description:
На данном графике не отображается информация о НЕ localstorage-дисках, так как в localstorage-дисках потребленное место рассчитывается неверно. 

Так как в rook нет поддержки метрик, то на данных графиках не отображается информация о дисках созданных rook'ом: https://github.com/deckhouse/deckhouse/issues/443

targets.expr:
sum by (namespace, controller) (
  max by (namespace, controller, persistentvolumeclaim)
  (
    sum by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
        max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_sx3])
    ) 

    * max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
      label_replace(
        max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_sx3]),
        "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
      + on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0)
    )

        * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_left(pod) 
    max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim, pod) (
         max_over_time(kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_sx3])
    ) 

       * on (namespace, pod) group_left(controller)
      kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} 
  )
)
/
sum by (namespace, controller) (
  max by (namespace, controller, persistentvolumeclaim)
  (
    sum by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
        max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_sx3])
    ) 

    * max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
      label_replace(
        max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_sx3]),
        "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
      + on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0)
    )

        * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_left(pod) 
    max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim, pod) (
         max_over_time(kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__interval_sx3])
    ) 

       * on (namespace, pod) group_left(controller)
      kube_controller_pod{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace", controller=~"$controller"} 
  )
)

panels.title: PVC Usage in % (except local storage classes)

targets.expr:
max by (persistentvolumeclaim) (
  max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]) 
  / 
  max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])
)

max by (persistentvolumeclaim) (
  max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_inodes_used{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range]) 
  / 
  max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_inodes{node=~"$node", namespace="$namespace"}[$__range])
)

panels.description: Так как в rook нет поддержки метрик, то на данных графиках не отображается информация о дисках созданных rook'ом: https://github.com/deckhouse/deckhouse/issues/443
panels.title: $persistentvolumeclaim
